english.segment1: Your masses, they come in droves, assemblies of misguided bones. Oh the blessings, with just enough faith. Their healings pass by with the plate.. plate.
english.segment2: Manipulate the people for a show, destruction to the Kingdom as you grow.
english.segment3: "Depart from me, I never knew you." "Depart from me, I never knew you."
english.segment4: You will build your house on sand. The rain will descend, the floods will come.
english.segment5: Great will be your houses fall. Great will be your houses fall. Great will be your houses fall. Great will be your houses fall.
